features: Crush Dish Duty - TikTok's favorite dishwasher pods are here! Puracy dishwasher detergent pods make your life easier and your dishes cleaner, minus the pre-rinse hassle. Fewer spousal arguments, more peace of mind.

Enjoy Perfect Dishes - Experience why this natural dishwasher detergent is a viral sensation! With advanced, plant-derived enzymes, these dishwasher pods quickly remove gunk, grime, and stubborn residue. Simply scrape the dishes, arrange, and enjoy your me-time.

Clean Effortlessly - Sick of scrubbing away stubborn food? Let our biodegradable dishwasher detergent save your day. It effectively rinses away dairy, wine, meat, oil, fruit, vegetables, starch, gluten, grease, and even last night’s lasagna.

Relax & Let the Pods Work - These dishwasher detergent pods are designed to clean anything dishwasher-safe. Our formula tackles ceramic, toys, pots, pans, glass, and anything you need sparkling clean. Just toss it in the dishwasher, sit back, and relax (ok, maybe the last part is wishful thinking).

Keep Your Home Pure - Get the purest clean with our natural dishwasher pods; free from sulfates, bleach, perfumes, dyes, animal by-products, and other nasty stuff. It's a dish cleaner you can feel good about using every day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gentle yet Effective: Free and Clear Natural Detergent Dishwasher Pods Review
reviews.reviewText: I've recently switched to using Free and Clear Natural Detergent Dishwasher Pods, and I must say, I am thoroughly impressed. These pods combine powerful cleaning abilities with a commitment to natural ingredients, making them a standout choice for anyone seeking a greener and safer alternative.One of the most notable features of these pods is their gentle formulation. As someone with sensitive skin, I appreciate that they are free from harsh chemicals and artificial fragrances. They leave no residue or irritating residues on my dishes, ensuring they come out clean and spotless, yet safe for use even on delicate glassware.Despite their natural composition, these pods do not compromise on cleaning power. They effortlessly tackle tough food stains, leaving my dishes sparkling clean after every wash. I've also noticed a significant reduction in water spots and film on glassware, a testament to their effectiveness.Another standout feature is the convenience of the pre-measured pods. They eliminate the need for messy liquid or powder detergents, ensuring that I use just the right amount for each wash. This not only saves time but also prevents any potential waste, making them an eco-conscious choice.The commitment to transparency and sustainability from the brand is evident in their eco-friendly packaging. The use of recyclable materials reinforces their dedication to reducing environmental impact, which aligns perfectly with my own values.In summary, Free and Clear Natural Detergent Dishwasher Pods have become an essential part of my household routine. Their gentle yet effective cleaning power, combined with their natural formulation, make them a top-notch choice for anyone seeking a safer and greener dishwasher detergent option. I wholeheartedly recommend giving them a try – you won't be disappointed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars works very well
reviews.reviewText: I love this stuff. I'm so glad I found it! It is so easy to use. My dishes are clean and my glassware is absolutely spotless. There is no residue left on my glasses as there was with the big box store brand I used to use, so I don't have to rinse the glass before I use it. I had noticed a slight foaminess in my water unless I rinsed the glass first. Ridiculous to have to do that - and now I don't. And it also doesn't have a strong chemical smell like any of the other commercial brands I have tried. I feel much better knowing I can use a product that isn't harmful to me, to the environment, or to my septic system. All good!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works best with unrinsed dishes
reviews.reviewText: We have soft water, and at first we had problems with suds left at the bottom of the dishwasher after washing. But now I don't completely rinse off my dishes (just wipe off larger particles before loading. I use hot water cycle, and my dishes come out clean, and no suds. I love that my dishes don't have any chemical scent after washing too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Does not work for me but does for boyfriend
reviews.reviewText: I have run five loads using this detergent and it barely cleaned the dishes. Each time, I had hand wash everything all over again. I tried doing a more thorough job rinsing the dishes, but that did not help. It simply does not clean the dishes. I have an water-saving dishwasher, so perhaps it works okay in machines that use more water. It is a shame, because I wanted to switch to a more environmentally friendly product. I think I will go back to Cascade for the time being....As I indicated in my last review, these did not work for my machine, but I wanted to see if they would work on my partner's machine to see if it works on his. And it did! He says that the dishes turned out well-washed, possibly better than his previous TJ pods. Additionally, the dishwasher itself looks cleaner. So 5 stars for him and 1 star for me. My dishwasher is IKEA and his is KitchenAid. I hope this is helpful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keep them on subscription
reviews.reviewText: I go through about a bag of these every month. I keep them on subscription so I never run out. They are a cleaner product than the typical chemical stuff people are wasting their dishes with. This product still does a great job getting rid of grease, oil and food. No chemical smells on my dishes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great diswasher pods with clean ingredients
reviews.reviewText: I love being able to throw pods into my dishwasher for ease of use, but didn't want to use products with bad chemicals, so I was so grateful to find the Puracy dishwasher pods! We have used these for years now, and I won't be going back to any others.Our dishes come out clean with no streaks, no leftover food on them, no spots. I have peace of mind knowing my dishes are getting clean and we arent exposed to harmful chemicals. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I throw these just right on in the washing machine not in the space on the door and they work awesome! The glasses come out looking crystal clear, no water spots

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for dishes only so/so for baby bottles.
reviews.reviewText: Leaves my dishes sparkling clean but leaves a residue or film on my Dr. Browns baby bottles sometimes. I’m not sure why because it’s only the bottle itself and the residue comes off if I soak in vinegar but hate to have to do that all the time. It also sometimes leave suds in the bottom of my dish washer so I’m not sure what that is. Other than that they are great. I’m back to square one on finding tabs that work to clean my baby bottles well.
Works like any other detergent, but now I know it’s not full of chemicals.

Dishes come out clean. As the manufacturer advises, don't rinse off dishes, etc. before placement in dishwasher since they say the cleaning solution won't work as well. Suits us fine, since we only use our dishwasher on average twice a week due to water conversation. Recommend this product 100%!

It is the best natural products dishwasher detergent pod I have used. It cleans the baked food container, oily container great. However they all leave the white powder layer on some items i.e. silicone, metal, plastic. This product leaves less powder behind than the others and I still need to scrub it off (can't just rinse) after the load is done.It is perfect for ceramic and glass items. I have hard water and I didn't add any rinse aid, there is no water spot

This product is 99.5% natural with no nasty ingredients and I just wasn't certain if it would do the job. Colour me skeptical. BUT....here's the great thing...it works wonderfully! It recommends you not rinse the dishes just scrape food off. Ok. Saving water and time but again, I was skeptical. I did what I was told, for once, and the dishes, pots everything came out shiny clean! Maybe the results will vary by dishwasher and water quality but for me, it is my permanent product. No need to look further.

reviews.reviewTitle: Works great and it doesn't have strong odour
reviews.reviewText: Works great and it doesn't have strong odour
